Lecturas Recomendadas

  • Ang, C. 2015. Analyzing financial data and implementing financial models using R. Springer. Segunda edición.
  • Hanck, C., Arnold, M., Gerber, A.y M. Schmelzer. 2020. Introduction to econometrics with R [link]
  • Ruppert, D. y D. Matteson. 2015. Statistics and data analysis for financial engineering with R examples. Springer. Segunda edición.
  • Tidyquant: tidy quantitative financial analysis [link]
  • Wickham, H. 2020. ggplot2: elegant graphics for data analysis [link]
  • Wickham, H. y G. Grolemund. 2017. R for data science. O'Reilly Media. 1a Edición [link]
  • Wilke, C. 2021. Fundamentals of data visualization [link]
  • Xie, Y., Allaire, J.J. y G. Grolemund. 2020. R Markdown: The definitive guide. CRC Press [link]
